author: jleroux
msg: Fixes <<"Lookup fields break when used with a form having skip-start="true">> https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-6139
We neglected this aspect so far, adding a "form-name" attribute to the lookup element fixes it. You then need also to set the correct id-name value on field element.

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-4068 do a hard stop on any error with exit code=99 (user error)

author: jleroux
msg: Fixes <<"Lookup fields break when used with a form having skip-start="true">> https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-6139
